sentences.en: An earthy , uncouth, servile peasant creature old Katy was.
sentences.cn: 老凯蒂真是个土里土气 、 恭顺的农民.

sentences.en: Because he got rid of his ignorant and uncouth sweetness, he is no longer a boy.
sentences.cn: 因为褪去了年少无知和天真烂漫, 他就不再是孩子了.

sentences.en: From a distance he looks uncouth.
He behaves in a most uncouth way.
He is a selfish, uncouth fellow, who has no respect for anyone.
sentences.cn: 他是个自私 、 没教养的家伙, 对人一点也不尊重.

sentences.en: He made the most uncouth and clumsy gestures of delight.
sentences.cn: 他做出的表示快乐的动作也是极笨拙、极难看的.

sentences.en: He remained heavy and somewhat uncouth.
sentences.cn: 他依旧郁郁寡欢,并且有点粗野.

sentences.en: He smirked in acknowledgement of their uncouth greetings, and sat down.
sentences.cn: 他皮笑肉不笑地接受了他的粗鲁的招呼, 坐了下来.

sentences.en: He would become dreadful, hideous, and uncouth.
sentences.cn: 他会变得怕人 、 丑陋和粗笨.

sentences.en: His nephew is an uncouth young man.
sentences.cn: 他的侄子是一个粗野的年轻人。

sentences.en: Others see us as overly materialistic, somewhat uncouth and lacking in social graces.
sentences.cn: 也有一些人觉得我们太过注重物质生活, 粗鲁和缺乏社交礼仪.

sentences.en: People turned to look after him , so uncouth was his shambling figure.
sentences.cn: “有什么用呢?"他想, "我已经全完了.我要摆脱这一切了.

sentences.en: Philip could not conceal from himself that the other clerks ill - paid and uncouth were more useful.
sentences.cn: 菲利浦自己不得不承认,别的办事员虽然收入微薄而且举止粗俗,可他们却比自己有用得多.

sentences.en: She may embarrass you with her uncouth behavior.
sentences.cn: 她的粗野行为可能会让你尴尬.

sentences.en: The article says that this could be because women can ‘better appreciate the thought and expense’ that goes into buying and wrapping chocolates than the uncouth men who wolf them down.
sentences.cn: 文章显示这可能是因为女性能更好的欣赏想法和消费而购买和包装巧克力，相反笨拙的男性会直接将其大口大口的吃掉。

sentences.en: The chapter was very long, and consisted entirely of names, uncouth and difficult to pronounce.
sentences.cn: 这一章很长, 包括许许多多人的姓名, 这些姓名陌生而又难于发音.

sentences.en: The Chinese disciples of Pareto might have thought him uncouth.
sentences.cn: 巴莱托的中国门徒们也许要嫌他粗鲁的吧.

sentences.en: We do have the odd barbarian as below who need to release his uncouth behavior as a result of acute servility .
sentences.cn: 我们确实有象楼下那样的异类野蛮人， 他们要发泄因极度奴性引起的粗野行为。

trans.tran_cn: 粗野的，（生活等）不文明的，不舒适的，<古>不知道的
trans.tran_en: behaving and speaking in a way that is rude or socially unacceptable
